articles.description: Kareena Kapoor, Neha Dhupia and Karan Johar shared pictures from the birthday bash as Yash and Roohi Johar turned four.
articles.content: Actor Kareena Kapoor Khan posted a bunch of pictures from Karan Johar's party to celebrate the fourth birthday of his kids--daughter Roohi and son Yash. Taking to her Instagram Stories, she shared th… [+1477 chars]

articles.title: Anushka Sharma poses with Vamika’s burp cloth. Hardik Pandya says it’s most important - India Today
articles.description: Anushka Sharma took to Instagram to reveal that her current favourite accessory is a burp cloth. Hardik Pandya says that it is the 'most important thing'.

articles.title: After Prabhas, next Kartik Aryan.. - Tollywood
articles.description: After Prabhas, next Kartik Aryan Om Raut, Kartik Aryan, Adipurush, Prabhas T-Series, and it will be shot in India and various locations
articles.content:
After Prabhas, next Kartik Aryan
Om Raut made his directorial debut with the historic drama Tanhaji , starring Ajay Devgn, Saif Ali Khan, and Kajol, and the movie was a blockbuster at the box office… [+995 chars]
